basics.second_message: Full-stack developer with experience in quality assurance (QA) and testing, passionate about technology and interface design. Strong focus on user experience and implementing efficient and accessible solutions. Technical skills in JavaScript, Vue3, React, TypeScript, and testing tools like JMeter and Jest.

soft_skills.title: Soft Skills
skills: I am a Full-stack developer with strong experience in JavaScript, Vue3, React, and TypeScript, specializing in creating web platforms and REST APIs. I use Git, Jest, and JMeter for development and testing. I also have strong skills in interface design using HTML, CSS, SASS, Figma, and Adobe XD.

My strengths include effective communication, teamwork, and project leadership. My background in psychology brings a valuable perspective to analyzing usability and user experience in digital products.

In my previous role at the Monterrey Government, I led the improvement of user experience in municipal digital products. I implemented efficient technological solutions, established design guidelines, and supervised usability tests to ensure the quality and accessibility of developed systems.

projects.title: iD Digital Mty
projects.description: Monterrey's digital identity service allows access to all municipal digital services with a single account.

projects.title: CMS Monterrey
projects.description: Content management system for all landing pages of the Monterrey Government.

projects.title: AccesoJoven
projects.description: Acceso Joven is a digital platform and card that allows you to stay connected with the Monterrey Youth Institute at all times.

projects.title: mira Mty
projects.description: A service that allows interaction with public information maps from the Monterrey Government.

projects.title: mide Mty
projects.description: A service that stores all data and maps from the Monterrey Government and allows their publication for citizens.

projects.title: Sanamente Mty
projects.description: A service that provides information to the public about mental health while allowing access to therapy and activities provided by the Monterrey Government.

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.description: I'd love to hear from you! Whether you have questions, want to discuss a project, or just want to connect, feel free to reach out. I'm always open to new opportunities and collaborations.
